websiteExplanation: This is a demo website representing a virtual art gallery. Images of artist and artworks belong to Unsplash.com were you can find the real authors of the images in this demo. Images in this demo have a fake price and are not for commercial use. Our only goal is to create a demo with the basic functionalities of an e-commerce website.
